thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Imbalie Beauty Says ‍Underwriters Agreed To Rights Offer From R10 Mln To R15 Mln Upon Same Conditions In Rights Offer Circular​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Imbalie Beauty Says ‍Underwriters Agreed To Rights Offer From R10 Mln To R15 Mln Upon Same Conditions In Rights Offer Circular​
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Imbalie Beauty Ltd:
* ‍UNDERWRITERS AGREED TO FULLY UNDERWRITE RIGHTS OFFER FROM R10 MILLION TO R15 MILLION UPON SAME TERMS AND CONDITIONS AS IN RIGHTS OFFER CIRCULAR​
* ‍RIGHTS OFFER WAS FULLY UNDERWRITTEN BY BRITS ENGINEERING INDUSTRIES PROPRIETARY LTD, HOLISTICS REMEDIES PROPRIETARY LTD, SA MADIBA INVESTMENTS​
* ‍UNDERWRITERS AGREED TO UNDERWRITE ALLOTMENT AND ISSUE OF 750 MILLION NEW ORDINARY NO PAR VALUE SHARES AT SUBSCRIPTION PRICE OF 2 CENTS PER RIGHTS SHARE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
